name: synchron0-260115
description:
WELCOME TO SYNCHRONOS

synchron operating system

prompt engineering project

We are attempting to design a system which will allow users on GitHub to clone the template for this app and at the same time synchronise the sequence of prompts which they use to continue building the app with Google AI Studio

We need to connect to files in the GitHub repository right from the start and encourage users with prompt suggestions on how to proceed so that - as much as possible - the app can be rebuild once again by a new user using the same prompts after cloning the repository at whatever stage they happen to join the project collaboration workflow

Also at any stage - within our own personal Google account - we could copy and rename the project in Google drive by reference to the system management core files stored in the GitHub repository

Renaming the new projects would have to follow a strict format: synchronX-[datestamp] where X=N starting at N=0 and increasing incrementally (format for datestamp: YYMMDD)

Do you think it would be possible to create such a project ???
